instructions: Open Settings . Go to Passwords & Accounts . If you don't see this option, go to Mail > Accounts or Mail > Contacts > Calendars , depending on your iOS version. Choose Add Account , then tap Yahoo . Enter your Yahoo email address, then tap Next . Enter the password to your Yahoo email account, then choose Sign in . If you're prompted to enter a code to verify your identity, follow the on-screen steps. Depending on how your account is configured, the code is sent to a different email address or to your phone as a text or phone call. Turn on the Mail toggle switch. Optionally, enable other items you want to sync, such as Contacts or Calendar events. Tap Save . Your Yahoo email account will begin syncing with your iPhone
